response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value not only in monetary terms but also in its unique features and benefits that align perfectly with your needs and aspirations. Given its significance, I propose a special introductory offer for you. For a limited time, you can purchase this product for $750,000. This exceptional deal is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in the product's value to you. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you require any further information to make your decision.", "product_price": 750000}
